channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Women of grace
channel.desc: Hosted by Johnnette Benkovic Williams, Women of Grace encourages and affirms women in their dignity as daughters of God and in their gift of authentic femininity.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Heidi explains how an announcement from her Baptist pastor steered her into an extended period of prayer and her discernment that led to Jesus calling her home to the Eucharist.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Ewtn news nightly
channel.desc: The Jubilee of Youth in Rome draws thousands of young pilgrims. The event is packed with activities, including Masses, concerts, time for confession, and a pilg.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Catholic sphere
channel.desc: Debbie Cowden and her panel of experts help parents discuss human sexuality with their children.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Door of faith
channel.desc: Fr Bede McGregor examines the writings of Pope Benedict XVI and his invitation to enter into a personal relationship with Jesus.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick
channel.desc: After celebrating in San Diego, Bear and Tony part ways and Bear finishes his long ride home to the Monterey Bay beach.
